isis.stitle: AIR COMPRESSOR: BENDIX TU-FLO 550 AND TU-FLO 750 - MAINTENANCE - SERVICE CHECKS AND OPERATING TESTS

svcproc.title: SERVICE CHECKS AND OPERATING TESTS
svcproc.para: Vehicles manufactured after the effective date of FMVSS121, with the minimum required reservoir volume, must have a compressor capable of raising air system pressure from 85-100 psi in 25 seconds or less. This test is performed with the engine operating at maximum recommended governed speed. The vehicle manufacturer must certify this performance on new vehicles with appropriate allowances for air systems with greater than the minimum required reservoir volume.
